Class simpleScraper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.simpleScraper

  • public class simpleScraper
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple scraper object that scrapes for both core requirements and course lists per discipline.
    Author:
    jake

        public static void getCoreReqs(java.lang.String url)
        Scraping for core requirements.

      • printReqToFile

        private static void printReqToFile(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> coreReqs,
                                   java.lang.String fileName)
        Prints core requisites to a file.
        Parameters:
        coreReqs - - The list of core requirements.
        fileName - - The filename where the information will be stored.

      • getCourseLists

        public static void getCourseLists(java.lang.String urlToScrape,
                                  java.lang.String fileName)
        Scrapes course pages for classes and their prerequistes. Example of courses webpage: https://catalog.unomaha.edu/undergraduate/college-information-science-technology/computer-science/#coursestextcontainer The information gathered will then be exported as a CSV file.
        Parameters:
        urlToScrape - - the URL that will be scraped.
        fileName - - The name of the file the info that is scraped will be exported to.

      • printToCSV

        private static void printToCSV(java.util.ArrayList<Course> classes,
                               java.lang.String fileName)
        Prints to CSV file with each class structured as CSCI 4560,3,"MATH 2230,*,MATH 2030,*,CSCI 2030," where "* " dictates or
        Parameters:
        classes - - the list of classes.
        fileName - - the filename the classes are going to placed.

      • scrape

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Course> scrape(java.lang.String url)
        Scrapes a specified URL for a tagged classes and their subsequent prerequisites. Note: not all prerequisites are "a" tagged.
        Parameters:
        url - - The URL of the page to scrape.
        Returns:
        an array list of courses.

      • removeOrAtEnd

        private static void removeOrAtEnd(java.util.ArrayList<Course> prereqs)
        Removes any hanging ORs (*) at the end of prerequisites list.
        Parameters:
        prereqs- - A list of courses that act as prerequisites to another course.
